What Was Swara Bhasker’s Tweet Really About? After self-styled Godman Sadhguru’s comment that “liberals are fanatics”, Swara Bhasker sent out a series of tweets using the hashtags #ButLiberalsAreFanatics #SadhguruSays. She made out multiple tweets related to atrocities that took place across the country in recent times. Her tweet on “assholes tied men to jeep” was not related to Major Gogoi or the Indian Army but the 2016 Una flogging where seven members of a Dalit family were tied to a jeep and beaten with iron rods for skinning a dead cow. The actress clarified the same on Twitter after her post was completely misinterpreted.
